name: What's Yours Is Mine
description:
Story:

The king is dead. His twin sons must battle, stealing each other's bodies through their pyschic link, vying for control of an amulet that guarantees them the throne!

Controls/Instructions:

A: Jump, X: Punch, B: Block

The twin with the amulet collects 3 orbs to score.

The twin without the amulet collects 3 orbs to power up, and attacks his opponent to steal his body.

Credits:

Made in 3 days for TOJam 11 by Ian Campbell, Bryan Depuy and Michelle Kaatz!
